description:
Enjoy a cute solitaire card game in a cute cartoon art style and play one of the three solitaire card game variation. Enjoy a relaxing and entertaining solitaire card game for everyone.

Kawaii Solitaire 3 in 1 is a small collection of three solitaire card games, the classic klondike variation, the tripeaks and the spider solitaire game.
The game is presented in a cartoony and cute art style to let you enjoy the different card games in a cute way.

Features :
- Three different card game variation
- Highscores and other stats
- Wide variation of cute Themes
name: Kawaii Solitaire 3 in 1
